channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: My brother’s ‘good daughter’ siphoned $70,000 from her father’s accounts. Should she still get an inheritance?
item.description: “He has a large old house, valued at about $170,000, and many valuable antiques. I will be the executor of his estate.”

item.title: It’s my dream to travel to Africa. Can I pay for my husband’s trip without commingling our finances?
item.description: “Should I save the money in case we eventually split up?”

item.title: Why Salesforce plans to buy Informatica in an $8 billion AI deal
item.description: The software giant faces “growing pressure to increase adoption of Agentforce,” its agentic AI offering, according to an analyst. Informatica’s data-m...

item.title: ‘You never know what might happen’: How do I make sure my son-in-law doesn’t get his hands on my daughter’s inheritance?
item.description: “So far, my daughter and her husband have a solid marriage.”

item.title: Consumer confidence rebounds in May on easing of U.S.-China tensions
item.description: The consumer confidence index jumped to 98 in May from a revised 85.7 in the prior month, the Conference Board said Tuesday, the first gain after five...

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
item.description: Arabica coffee prices hit a record level, as traders digested the withdrawal of President Trump’s threats to impose tariffs and economic sanctions on ...

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
